trans-unit.source: 1. `pip install django-sendgrid-webhook`
trans-unit.target: 1.`pip install django-sendgrid-webhook`。

trans-unit.source: 2. Add app to INSTALLED_APPS

trans-unit.source: 3. South compatibility (Django < 1.7)
trans-unit.target: 3.南兼容性（Django <1.7）

trans-unit.source: 4. Run `python manage.py syncdb` to install the new Email model
trans-unit.target: 4.运行 "python manage.py syncdb "来安装新的Email模型。

trans-unit.source: 5. Include `sendgrid.urls` at some point in your url structure. E.g. in `/urls.py`:
trans-unit.target: 5.在你的url结构中的某个位置加入`sendgrid.urls`。例如在`/urls.py`中。

trans-unit.source: 6. Go to https://sendgrid.com/app and add the App `Event Notification`.
trans-unit.target: 6.进入https://sendgrid.com/app,添加App`事件通知`。

trans-unit.target: 7.配置App发送你想要的事件,并添加Callback URL。如果你包含了`sendgrid.urls`,如

trans-unit.source: A small django app around sendgrid and its webhooks
trans-unit.target: 一个围绕sendgrid和它的webhooks的小型django应用。

trans-unit.source: Configuration
trans-unit.target: 配置

trans-unit.source: Configuration Options
trans-unit.target: 配置选项

trans-unit.source: Currently we only have one configuration option which can be added to the django settings.
trans-unit.target: 目前我们只有一个配置选项,可以添加到django设置中。

trans-unit.source: Django versions in `django.core.mail`. In fact the easiest transition is to just replace every use of
trans-unit.target: `django.core.mail`中的Django版本。事实上,最简单的过渡就是把所有使用的

trans-unit.source: Every time a new object is created or a callback is received, the signal `sendgrid.signals.email_event` is dispatched.
trans-unit.target: 每当创建一个新对象或接收到一个回调时,信号`sendgrid.signals.email_event`就会被发送。

trans-unit.source: From then on every email you send will include an UUID parameter to track the callback, and a new instance of the
trans-unit.target: 从那时起,你发送的每封邮件都会包含一个UUID参数来跟踪回调,并且会有一个新的回调实例

trans-unit.source: INSTALLED_APPS += 'sendgrid'
trans-unit.target: INSTALLED_APPS +='sendgrid' 。

trans-unit.source: In theory you can send messages yourself by adding a UUID parameter to the `unique_args` parameter in the SMTP header
trans-unit.target: 理论上,你可以通过在SMTP头中的 "unique_args "参数中添加UUID参数来自己发送邮件。

trans-unit.source: Sending emails (the easy way)
trans-unit.target: 发送电子邮件(简单的方法

trans-unit.source: Signals
trans-unit.target: 信号

trans-unit.source: This django app enables you to send emails to sendgrid and receive callbacks to monitor the status of all your emails.
trans-unit.target: 这个django应用可以让你向sendgrid发送邮件,并接收回调来监控所有邮件的状态。

trans-unit.source: This will add the callback path `/sendgrid_callback/`.
trans-unit.target: 这将增加回调路径`/sendgrid_callback/`。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 使用方法

trans-unit.source: You can also attach a related object to the `Email` object by passing an `obj` parameter in the `.send()` function of
trans-unit.target: 你也可以通过在`.send()`函数中传递一个`obj`参数,将一个相关的对象附加到`Email`对象上。

trans-unit.source: You can also attach them to a related object in your own app. A signal will be dispatched every time a new callback is
trans-unit.target: 你也可以将它们附加到自己应用中的相关对象上。每次有新的回调时,都会发出一个信号
